sentences.en: a poster campaign for the election
A team of volunteers were putting up posters .
sentences.cn: 一队志愿者正在张贴海报。

sentences.en: Each poster is signed by the artist.
sentences.cn: 每幅海报都有这个艺术家的签名。

sentences.en: He saw the poster in the doctor's surgery.
sentences.cn: 他在那位医生的外科诊所里看到了这张海报.

sentences.en: Hey! Somebody put their poster on top of ours.
sentences.cn: 嘿! 有人把海报贴在我们的上面.

sentences.en: I thought you might like to see how the poster iscoming along.
sentences.cn: 我想你可能会想要看看海报做出来是什么样子.

sentences.en: On each landing, opposite the lift - shaft, the poster with the enormous face gazed from the wall.
sentences.cn: 每一层楼, 正对电梯间的墙上, 都是那幅海报 —— 一张巨大的脸孔凝视着你.

sentences.en: Please add a note to the poster.
The poster advertising the bullfight is pasted onto show window.
sentences.cn: 为斗牛做广告的海报贴在展览橱窗上.

sentences.en: The poster had been nipped to pieces.
The poster only stayed up a few hours, before it was stolen.
sentences.cn: 那张海报贴上去没几个小时就让人给偷走了.

sentences.en: The students put up a poster on the bulletin board.
sentences.cn: 学生们在布告牌上贴了一张海报.

sentences.en: There is a poster about the pop festival.
sentences.cn: 有一张关于流行音乐节的海报.

sentences.en: This poster is offensive and degrades women.
sentences.cn: 这张海报冒失无礼，有辱女性尊严。

sentences.en: Washington looks like a poster boy for strength and athleticism.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿看上去是个典型的体魄强健、崇尚运动的人。

sentences.en: We used paste to attach our designs to the poster.
sentences.cn: 我们用浆糊把我们设计的图案贴在招贴牌上.

sentences.en: Zidane has become the poster child for a whole generation of French-born youths of North African extraction.
sentences.cn: 齐达内已成为在法国出生、有着北非血统的年轻一代的典范。

phrases.tran_cn: 广告纸板；海报用纸；写布告用的硬纸板
n. 作为模范的人或物

trans.tran_cn: 海报，招贴，公告，招贴画，张贴者，[古语]急行的人，匆忙赶路的人
trans.tran_en: a large printed notice, picture, or photograph, used to advertise something or as a decoration
